reasoning: Iatrogenic lymphoproliferative disorder in MTX-treated patients. Cumulative incidence 1.3% at 5 years and 4.7% at 10 years in RA patients. Estimated ~26 cases per 100,000 patients on MTX therapy. Highly dependent on drug exposure and patient population.
source: Tanaka Y et al. (2023). Lymphoproliferative disorder risk after methotrexate treatment for rheumatoid arthritis. Cancer Sci. 114(3):934-944
